alert.note: Alert for Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Lincoln (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kennebec, west central Waldo and north central Lincoln Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 917 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Manchester, or near Augusta, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Augusta, Waterville, Gardiner, China, Belgrade, Farmingdale, Manchester, Hallowell, Liberty, Palermo, Winthrop, Chelsea, Windsor, Sidney, Pittston, Vassalboro, West Gardiner, Readfield, Somerville and Winslow. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 near mile marker 51. Interstate 95 between mile markers 100 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
